content.text: Match ends, West Ham United 2, Watford 0.
Second Half ends, West Ham United 2, Watford 0.
Offside, West Ham United. Pablo Zabaleta tries a through ball, but Sam Byram is caught offside.
Sebastian Prödl (Watford) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Jordan Hugill (West Ham United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Sebastian Prödl (Watford).
Attempt blocked. Adrian Mariappa (Watford) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by José Holebas with a cross.
Foul by Jordan Hugill (West Ham United).
Adrian Mariappa (Watford) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, West Ham United. Jordan Hugill replaces Chicharito.
Corner,  Watford. Conceded by Sam Byram.
Attempt blocked. Adrian Mariappa (Watford) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Dodi Lukebakio with a cross.
Corner,  Watford. Conceded by Declan Rice.
Substitution, West Ham United. Declan Rice replaces Marko Arnautovic.
Substitution, Watford. Andre Gray replaces Richarlison.
Attempt missed. Dodi Lukebakio (Watford) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Abdoulaye Doucouré.
Attempt saved. Richarlison (Watford) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Dodi Lukebakio.
Adrian Mariappa (Watford) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Marko Arnautovic (West Ham United).

Goal!  West Ham United 2, Watford 0. Marko Arnautovic (West Ham United) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Aaron Cresswell following a corner.
Corner,  West Ham United. Conceded by José Holebas.
Substitution, West Ham United. Sam Byram replaces João Mário.
Attempt missed. Sebastian Prödl (Watford) header from very close range is too high. Assisted by José Holebas with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Watford. Conceded by Cheikhou Kouyaté.
Substitution, Watford. Dodi Lukebakio replaces Gerard Deulofeu.
Corner,  West Ham United. Conceded by Daryl Janmaat.
Attempt missed. Etienne Capoue (Watford) right footed shot from more than 35 yards misses to the right. Assisted by Abdoulaye Doucouré.
Offside, Watford. José Holebas tries a through ball, but Troy Deeney is caught offside.
Corner,  Watford. Conceded by Angelo Ogbonna.
Attempt saved. Gerard Deulofeu (Watford) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
Substitution, Watford. Roberto Pereyra replaces Marvin Zeegelaar.
Foul by Cheikhou Kouyaté (West Ham United).
Gerard Deulofeu (Watford) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Corner,  West Ham United. Conceded by Sebastian Prödl.
Attempt missed. Cheikhou Kouyaté (West Ham United) header from very close range is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by João Mário with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  West Ham United. Conceded by Adrian Mariappa.
Attempt missed. Cheikhou Kouyaté (West Ham United) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.
Corner,  Watford. Conceded by Aaron Cresswell.
